title: Validate Code Executor
description: Combined validation for new methods, modified methods, and file sizes. Configure via targetDefaults in nx.json for runtime options (no cache issues).

methodMaxLimit.description: Configuration for method line limit validation

mode.description: OFF: skip validation. NEW_METHODS: only new methods in diff. NEW_AND_MODIFIED_METHODS: new methods + methods with changes. MODIFIED_FILES: all methods in modified files.

disableAllowed.description: Whether disable comments work. When false, no escape hatch (like old STRICT mode).

ignoreModifiedUntilEpoch.description: Epoch seconds. Until this time, skip modified-method validation (new methods still enforced). When expired, normal mode resumes. Omit when not needed.

fileMaxLimit.description: Configuration for file line limit validation

mode.description: OFF: skip validation. MODIFIED_FILES: all code in modified files.

disableAllowed.description: Whether disable comments work. When false, no escape hatch (like old STRICT mode).

ignoreModifiedUntilEpoch.description: Epoch seconds. Until this time, skip modified-file validation. When expired, normal mode resumes. Omit when not needed.

requireReturnTypeMode.description: OFF: skip return type validation. NEW_METHODS: only new methods in diff. NEW_AND_MODIFIED_METHODS: new methods + methods with changes. MODIFIED_FILES: all methods in modified files.

noInlineTypeLiteralsMode.description: OFF: skip validation. NEW_METHODS: only new methods. NEW_AND_MODIFIED_METHODS: new + modified methods. MODIFIED_FILES: all in modified files. Disallows inline type literals like { x: number } - use named types instead.

noAnyUnknownMode.description: OFF: skip validation. MODIFIED_CODE: only changed lines in diff. MODIFIED_FILES: all in modified files. Disallows `any` and `unknown` TypeScript keywords.
